title: Leaders Eat Last
author: Simon Sinek
summary: Sinek's exploration of effective leadership and the importance of creating a culture of trust and collaboration. 'Leaders Eat Last' discusses the role of leaders in fostering a sense of belonging and commitment within their teams.

title: Dare to Lead
author: Bren√© Brown
summary: Brown's guide to courageous leadership and creating workplaces based on vulnerability and empathy. 'Dare to Lead' explores the qualities that make leaders effective and resilient in the face of challenges.

title: The 21 Irrefutable Laws of Leadership
author: John C. Maxwell
summary: Maxwell's examination of the fundamental laws that govern effective leadership. 'The 21 Irrefutable Laws of Leadership' provides practical insights and principles for aspiring leaders to enhance their leadership skills.
